LanguageData.PauseWalkerHediff.label: Out of Sync
LanguageData.PauseWalkerHediff.description: An unknown force surges within their body. This entity is temporarily detached from the flow of time, continuing onward through frozen moments, gradually reversing the damage to their body.
LanguageData.PauseWalkerResurrectHediff.label: Time Reversal Field
LanguageData.PauseWalkerResurrectHediff.description: A small time reversal field resides within this being. Upon death, it may be manually triggered to restore the body to its prior state and revive the individual.
